reg_info.act_under: Land Transfer Tax Act   Loi sur les droits de cession immobilière

content.content: 1.A notice of objection under subsection 13 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1.A notice of objection under subsection 13 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 1.

content.content: 2.A notice of appeal under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2.A notice of appeal under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 2.

content.content: 3.The affidavit referred to in subsection 2 (2) of Regulation 697 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in the English version of Form 3 except where the conveyance is registered in the Registry Division of Prescott (No. 46) or Sudbury (No. 53) in which case the affidavit may be in the French version of Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3.The affidavit referred to in subsection 2 (2) of Regulation 697 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in the English version of Form 3 except where the conveyance is registered in the Registry Division of Prescott (No. 46) or Sudbury (No. 53) in which case the affidavit may be in the French version of Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 3.

content.content: 4.The affidavit referred to in subsection 3 (3) of Regulation 697 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in the English version of Form 4 except where the conveyance is registered in the Registry Division of Prescott (No. 46) or Sudbury (No. 53) in which case the affidavit may be in the French version of Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4.The affidavit referred to in subsection 3 (3) of Regulation 697 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in the English version of Form 4 except where the conveyance is registered in the Registry Division of Prescott (No. 46) or Sudbury (No. 53) in which case the affidavit may be in the French version of Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 4.

content.content: 5.When a conveyance to which Form 3 is attached is tendered for registration, there shall also be provided to the collector to whom such conveyance is tendered for registration, one fully executed and completed duplicate copy of such form and such duplicate copy shall not be attached to any conveyance tendered for registration. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5.When a conveyance to which Form 3 is attached is tendered for registration, there shall also be provided to the collector to whom such conveyance is tendered for registration, one fully executed and completed duplicate copy of such form and such duplicate copy shall not be attached to any conveyance tendered for registration. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 5.

content.content: 6.A return on disposition of agricultural land under subsection 5 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6.A return on disposition of agricultural land under subsection 5 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 6.

content.content: 7.A statement of disallowance under subsection 8 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 7.
content.raw_html: 7.A statement of disallowance under subsection 8 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 7.

content.content: 8.A notice of assessment under section 12 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 8. content.raw_html:
8.A notice of assessment under section 12 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 699, s. 8.
